Author: Zak
Content: I don't think the fact that the site is written in Arc makes the site itself any more interesting. Arc is interesting, as is the fact that it's to the point where it could be used to make this site.

Author: Elfan
Content: Is there going to be some way to downvote/mark as read or otherwise clear links we don't want to view right now?

Author: jmzachary
Content: I don't know if it's the best, but it's the only one I use. It's simple interface is what I find most useful about it. If I need more (which is rare), I use the GIMP.
